STATIC_ABILITY.LOCALISED_TEXT: エンチャント（クリーチャー）
STATIC_ABILITY.CONTINUOUS_ACTION: local attach_filter = Object():AttachmentFilter_Get() attach_filter:Clear() attach_filter:AddCardType( CARD_TYPE_CREATURE )

STATIC_ABILITY.LOCALISED_TEXT: Enchanted creature gets +2/+0 and has trample.
La créature enchantée gagne +2/+0 et a le piétinement.
La criatura encantada obtiene +2/+0 y tiene la habilidad de arrollar.
Die verzauberte Kreatur erhält +2/+0 und verursacht Trampelschaden.
La creatura incantata prende +2/+0 e ha travolgere.
エンチャントされているクリーチャーは、＋２/＋０の修整を受けるとともにトランプルを持つ。
부여된 생물은 +2/+0을 받고 돌진 능력을 가진다.
Зачарованное существо получает +2/+0 и имеет Пробивной удар.
A criatura encantada recebe +2/+0 e tem atropelar.
STATIC_ABILITY.CONTINUOUS_ACTION: local parent = Object():GetParent() if parent ~= nil then parent:GetCurrentCharacteristics():Power_Add( 2 ) parent:GetCurrentCharacteristics():Toughness_Add( 0 ) end
local parent = Object():GetParent() if parent ~= nil then parent:GetCurrentCharacteristics():Characteristic_Set( CHARACTERISTIC_TRAMPLE, 1 ) end

TRIGGERED_ABILITY.LOCALISED_TEXT: When Rancor is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, return Rancor to its owner’s hand.
Quand la Rancœur est mise dans un cimetière depuis le champ de bataille, renvoyez la Rancœur dans la main de son propriétaire.
Cuando el Rencor vaya a un cementerio desde el campo de batalla, regresa el Rencor a la mano de su propietario.
Wenn der Grüne Zorn aus dem Spiel in einen Friedhof gelegt wird, bringe den Grünen Zorn auf die Hand seines Besitzers zurück.
Quando il Rancore viene messo in un cimitero dal campo di battaglia, fai tornare il Rancore in mano al suo proprietario.
怨恨が戦場からいずれかの墓地に置かれたとき、怨恨をオーナーの手札に戻す。
원한이 전장에서 무덤에 들어갈 때, 원한을 소유자의 손으로 되돌린다.
Когда Злоба попадает с поля битвы на кладбище, верните Злобу в руку ее владельца.
Quando Rancor for colocado num cemitério vindo do campo de batalha, devolva Rancor para a mão de seu dono.
TRIGGERED_ABILITY.RESOLUTION_TIME_ACTION: if EffectSource() ~= nil and EffectSource():GetZone() == ZONE_GRAVEYARD then EffectSource():GuidedReveal( ZONE_GRAVEYARD, ZONE_HAND ) EffectSource():PutInHand() end

SPELL_ABILITY.TARGET_DEFINITION: local filter = Object():GetFilter() filter:Clear() filter:AddCardType( CARD_TYPE_CREATURE ) filter:SetZone( ZONE_IN_PLAY ) filter:SetHint( HINT_ALLIED_ONLY, EffectController() )
SPELL_ABILITY.RESOLUTION_TIME_ACTION: local target_card = EffectDC():Get_Targets(0):Get_CardPtr(0) if target_card ~= nil then Object():Enchant( target_card ) end
